title: Google\Cloud\Ids\V1\Endpoint
name: Endpoint
description:
Endpoint describes a single IDS endpoint. It defines a forwarding rule to which packets can be sent for IDS inspection.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.ids.v1.Endpoint

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.description: Output only. The update time timestamp.

params.description: The labels of the endpoint.

params.name: data.network
params.description: Required. The fully qualified URL of the network to which the IDS Endpoint is attached.

params.description: Output only. The fully qualified URL of the endpoint's ILB Forwarding Rule.

params.description: Output only. The IP address of the IDS Endpoint's ILB.

params.description: Required. Lowest threat severity that this endpoint will alert on.

params.description: Whether the endpoint should report traffic logs in addition to threat logs.
